languages.text: {n}Абеляр качает головой{/n} "И вы что-то говорили о моей семье и чести, Урбенд? Впрочем, не имею желание топтать поверженного. Лорд-капитан, полученное вами признание позволяет снять обвинения с рода Версериан".

traits.locale_text: "Вы говорили что-то о моей семье и чести, Урбенд? Лорд-капитан, полученное вами признание позволяет полностью снять обвинения с рода Версериан".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard shakes his head.{/n} "And you called my family's honour into question, Urbend. Nevertheless, I harbour no desire to kick a man when he is down. Lord Captain, the confession you have obtained means that House Werserian can now be cleared of all charges."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр качает головой{/n} "И вы что-то говорили о моей семье и чести, Урбенд? Впрочем, не имею желание топтать поверженного. Лорд-капитан, полученное вами признание позволяет снять обвинения с рода Версериан".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard shakes his head.{/n} "And to think you were saying something about my family and honour, Urbend. Nevertheless, I do not have the desire to trample on those who are already down. Lord Captain, the confession you have obtained allows to clear House Werserian of all the charges."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard shakes his head.{/n} "And to think you were saying something about my family and honour, Urbend. Nevertheless, I do not have the desire to trample on those who are already down. Lord Captain, the confession you have obtained allows to clear House Werserian of all the charges."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

Nevertheless, I harbour no desire to trample on those who are already down. Lord Captain, the confession you have obtained allows me to clear House Werserian of all the charges."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard shakes his head.{/n} "And to think you were saying something about my family and honour, Urbend. Nevertheless, I harbour no desire to trample on those who are already down. Lord Captain, the confession you have obtained allows me to clear House Werserian of all the charges."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard shakes his head.{/n} "And you called my family's honour into question, Urbend. Nevertheless, I harbour no desire to kick a man when he is down. Lord Captain, the confession you have obtained means that House Werserian can now be cleared of all charges."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard shakes his head.{/n} "And you called my family's honour into question, Urbend. Nevertheless, I harbour no desire to kick a man when he is down. Lord Captain, the confession you have obtained means that House Werserian can now be cleared of all charges."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは首を振った。{/n}「アーベント、お前は私の一族の名誉を傷つけた。とはいえ、私はあえて死人にむち打つつもりはない。ロード・キャプテン、あなたが得た自白により、ウェルザリアン家の容疑は晴れました」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard shakes his head.{/n} "And you called my family's honour into question, Urbend. Nevertheless, I harbour no desire to kick a man when he is down. Lord Captain, the confession you have obtained means that House Werserian can now be cleared of all charges."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは首を振った。{/n}「アーベント、お前は私の一族の名誉を傷つけた。とはいえ、私はあえて死人にむち打つつもりはない。ロード・キャプテン、あなたが得た自白により、ウェルザリアン家の容疑は晴れました」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德摇了摇头。{/n}“你还质疑了我的家族的名誉，厄本。不过，我无意做落井下石之徒。舰长大人，您得到的这份供词，应该足以洗刷韦尔森家族的罪名了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard shakes his head.{/n} "And you called my family's honour into question, Urbend. Nevertheless, I harbour no desire to kick a man when he is down. Lord Captain, the confession you have obtained means that House Werserian can now be cleared of all charges."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德摇了摇头。{/n}“你还质疑了我的家族的名誉，厄本。不过，我无意做落井下石之徒。舰长大人，您得到的这份供词，应该足以洗刷韦尔森家族的罪名了。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Et dire que vous remettiez l'honneur de ma famille en question, Urbend, {n}dit Abélard en secouant la tête.{/n} Quoi qu'il en soit, il n'est pas dans mes habitudes de frapper un homme à terre. {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les aveux que vous avez obtenus disculpent la maison Werserian de toutes les accusations portées à son encontre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard shakes his head.{/n} "And you called my family's honour into question, Urbend. Nevertheless, I harbour no desire to kick a man when he is down. Lord Captain, the confession you have obtained means that House Werserian can now be cleared of all charges."

traits.locale_text: « Et dire que vous remettiez l'honneur de ma famille en question, Urbend, {n}dit Abélard en secouant la tête.{/n} Quoi qu'il en soit, il n'est pas dans mes habitudes de frapper un homme à terre. {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les aveux que vous avez obtenus disculpent la maison Werserian de toutes les accusations portées à son encontre. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Y pensar que ponía en entredicho el honor de mi casa, Urbend. Sin embargo, no tengo intención de apalear a un hombre abatido. Lord Capitán, la confesión que acaba de obtener basta para exonerar a la casa Werserian de todos los cargos».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard shakes his head.{/n} "And you called my family's honour into question, Urbend. Nevertheless, I harbour no desire to kick a man when he is down. Lord Captain, the confession you have obtained means that House Werserian can now be cleared of all charges."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Y pensar que ponía en entredicho el honor de mi casa, Urbend. Sin embargo, no tengo intención de apalear a un hombre abatido. Lord Capitán, la confesión que acaba de obtener basta para exonerar a la casa Werserian de todos los cargos».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Und Ihr habt die Ehre meiner Familie infrage gestellt, Urbend. Dennoch hege ich nicht den Wunsch, einen Mann zu treten, der bereits auf dem Boden liegt. Lord Captain, dank des von Euch erwirkten Geständnisses kann Haus Werserian von allen Anklagepunkten freigesprochen werden."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard shakes his head.{/n} "And you called my family's honour into question, Urbend. Nevertheless, I harbour no desire to kick a man when he is down. Lord Captain, the confession you have obtained means that House Werserian can now be cleared of all charges."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Und Ihr habt es gewagt, etwas über meine Familie und Ehre zu sagen, Urbend. Dennoch, ich trample nicht auf jemandem herum, der bereits am Boden liegt. Lord Captain, das von Euch erwirkte Geständnis gestattet es mir, Haus Werserian von allen Anschuldigungen freizusprechen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, başını iki yana sallıyor.{/n} "Bir de benim hanemin onuruna leke sürmeye kalktın Urbend. Yine de düşene tekme atacak değilim. Lord Kaptan, az evvel duyduğunuz itirafla Werserian Hanesi'nin adı temize çıkmıştır."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard shakes his head.{/n} "And you called my family's honour into question, Urbend. Nevertheless, I harbour no desire to kick a man when he is down. Lord Captain, the confession you have obtained means that House Werserian can now be cleared of all charges."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard başını iki yana sallıyor.{/n} "Bir de benim hanemin onuruna leke sürmeye kalktın Urbend. Yine de düşene tekme atacak değilim. Lord Kaptan, az evvel duyduğunuz itirafla Werserian Hanesinin adı temize çıkmıştır."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
